text:
`hs upload` gave me an error on a module’s meta.json file
```One field (resourceId or url) must be defined, but not both.```
I ran the same command again and it worked :thinking_face: … For some context I am throwing a lot of hs upload commands at once
gonna try and do this synchronously and I’ll let y’all know what I find!
Synchronous worked! I was using node exec() but I swapped to node execSync() and it did the trick – although it is much slower lol
